operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO chats (creator_user_id, access_hash, random_id, participant_count, title, about, default_banned_rights, date) VALUES (:creator_user_id, :access_hash, :random_id, :participant_count, :title, :about, :default_banned_rights, :date)

operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, noforwards, available_reactions_type, available_reactions, deactivated, ttl_period, version, date FROM chats WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectLastCreator
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, noforwards, available_reactions_type, available_reactions, deactivated, ttl_period, version, date FROM chats WHERE creator_user_id=:creator_user_id ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

operation.name: UpdateTitle
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET title=:title, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAbout
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET about = :about WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SelectByIdList
operation.sql: SELECT id, creator_user_id, access_hash, participant_count, title, about, photo_id, default_banned_rights, migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash, noforwards, available_reactions_type, available_reactions, deactivated, ttl_period, version, date FROM chats WHERE id IN (:idList)

operation.name: UpdateParticipantCount
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET participant_count=:participant_count, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdatePhotoId
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET photo_id=:photo_id, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateDefaultBannedRights
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET default_banned_rights=:default_banned_rights, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateVersion
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateDeactivated
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET deactivated=:deactivated, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateMigratedTo
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET migrated_to_id = :migrated_to_id, migrated_to_access_hash = :migrated_to_access_hash, participant_count = 0, deactivated = 1, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateAvailableReactions
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET available_reactions_type = :available_reactions_type, available_reactions = :available_reactions WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateNoforwards
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET noforwards=:noforwards, version=version+1 WHERE id=:id

operation.name: UpdateTTLPeriod
operation.sql: UPDATE chats SET ttl_period=:ttl_period WHERE id=:id

operation.name: SearchByQueryString
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM chats WHERE title LIKE :q LIMIT :limit
